channel.title: Datmaker 1.41 and model help!
channel.description: I have scaled and inserted several new items into my 508 including torva chaotic ect. My only issue is that I am using datmaker 1.37c and I can't load alot of objects. I can't load pernix legs or ceremonial robe top ect. I would really like to be able to get them into the server. I tried loading the model directly on the client and it turned me invis even with a number under 15000. I tried forcing it to convert to mqo and then meta wouldnt load it. Could someone please help me or give me a link to the newest datmaker 1.41+. TYVM!!!

item.title: Datmaker 1.41 and model help!
item.dc:creator: @halolouis halolouis
item.description:
@halolouis wrote:

I have scaled and inserted several new items into my 508 including torva chaotic ect. My only issue is that I am using datmaker 1.37c and I can’t load alot of objects. I can’t load pernix legs or ceremonial robe top ect. I would really like to be able to get them into the server. I tried loading the model directly on the client and it turned me invis even with a number under 15000. I tried forcing it to convert to mqo and then meta wouldnt load it. Could someone please help me or give me a link to the newest datmaker 1.41+.
TYVM!!!
